INSERT ALL
INTO MSSAPP.MC_AC_FUND_TXN_REC (AC_FUND_TXN_RID, FUND_STAT_CDE, IS_REV, REV_AC_FUND_TXN_RID, REC_VER_NUM, INIT_TIME, LAST_UPD_TIME, LAST_UPD_BY, TAG_SEQ) VALUES ( #{item.acFundTxnRid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.fundStatCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isRev,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.revAcFundTxnRid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.recVerNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.initTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastUpdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastUpdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tagSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT})
SELECT 1 FROM DUAL
